pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, April 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, April 22, 2017:

Mississauga, Ontario 

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will attend the Harry Jerome Awards. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

International Centre
6900 Airport Road
Mississauga, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage

  • Media must arrive no later than 5:00 p.m. and register at main entrance
